column4: quick question, does 6.10's GUI installer support resizing NTFS partitions?
i think if there is lots of unoccupied space around it... i don't know, i haven't used NTFS partitions in a long time.
my friend wants to try ubuntu, but his entire disk is a single NTFS partition, and i haven't used gparted in a while ;)
and he wants to save all his music, etc.... if the drive is completely NTFS, you're going to need a drive to back stuff up to on.
